5.Write a program for form validation using JavaScript

Here is the following code for html save the file as .html

<!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <title>sample</title> <script type="text/javascript"> function validateForm() { var un = document.forms["myForm"]["myusername"].value; if (un == "") { alert("Name must be filled out"); return false; } var pw = document.forms["myForm"]["mypassword"].value; if (pw == "") { alert("Password must be Filled"); return false; } var cpw = document.forms["myForm"]["myconfirmpassword"].value; if(cpw == "") { alert("Retype the password") return false; } else if(pw != cpw) { alert("Please check the Password you have entered it Does not match"); return false; } var adrs = document.forms["myForm"]["myaddress"].value; if (adrs == "") { alert("Please enter your address you cannot leave this empty"); return false; } } </script> </head> <body> <h1 align="center">Validation Form Using JavaScript</h1> <form name="myForm" onsubmit="return validateForm()" method="post"> <table align="center"> <tr> <td> Name:</td> <td> <input type="text" name="myusername"></td> </tr> <tr> <td> Password:</td> <td> <input type="Password" name="mypassword"></td> </tr> <tr> <td> ConfirmPassword:</td> <td> <input type="Password" name="myconfirmpassword"></td> </tr> <tr> <td> Address:</td> <td> <textarea rows="4" cols="22" name="myaddress"></textarea> </td> </tr> <tr> <td></td> <td> <input type="submit" value="Submit"> <input type="reset" value="Reset"> </td> </tr> </table> </form> </body> </html>
